page.title: 15Education
page.content: Education in this area is the responsibility of the Hampshire Local Education Authority. There is an Area Education Officer and staff based in Basingstoke whose area includes all of North West Hampshire. Our area includes one secondary comprehensive school taking pupils from 11 to 16 years old. This school is called the Vyne, and is an amalgamation of Queen Marys Boys Grammar School and Charles Chute, the boys secondary modern school. There are two primary schools affiliated to churches, St. Bedes R.C., and Sherborne St. John C.E.(Cont.). The area has two pairs of infant and junior schools, Merton infant and junior on the Popley estate and Oakridge infant and junior on the Oakridge estate. There are also three special schools in the area.
